channel.title: ::givemod + ::giveadmin + ::giveowner + ::demote codes?
channel.description: Can someone give me the codes and if its a certain place where to put them?

item.title: ::givemod + ::giveadmin + ::giveowner + ::demote codes?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“marc is hood, post:8, topic:180159”][quote author=0wned_plox link=topic=241409.msg2044365#msg2044365 date=1202668714]
that person only gave u how to give mod or admin
I have commands for admin \ mod \ hidden admin \ and demoting
Here you are:

[code]else if(command.startsWith(“admin”) && playerRights == 3) {
String name = command.substring(7);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.playerRights = 2;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
c.disconnected = true;
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (""+command.substring(7)+" has been made into an Admin by “+playerName+”");
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}

else if(command.startsWith(“givemod”) && playerRights == 3) {
String name = command.substring(7);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.playerRights = 1;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
c.disconnected = true;
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (""+command.substring(7)+" has been made into a Mod by “+playerName+”");
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}

else if(command.startsWith(“coown”) && playerRights == 3) {
String name = command.substring(7);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.playerRights = 3;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
c.disconnected = true;
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (""+command.substring(7)+" has been made into a Co owner by “+playerName+”");
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}

else if(command.startsWith(“givereg”) && playerRights == 3) {
String name = command.substring(7);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.playerRights = 0;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
c.disconnected = true;
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (""+command.substring(7)+" has been made into a reg player by “+playerName+”");
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}

else if(command.startsWith(“hidden”) && playerRights == 3) {
String name = command.substring(7);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.playerRights = 4;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
c.disconnected = true;
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (""+command.substring(7)+" has been made into a hidden admin by “+playerName+”");
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}

[/code]
[/quote]there is only 1 thing wrong with that, On the Command.startsWith you put (“admin”) and it needs to be (“giveadmin”) :P[/quote]

It doesnt really matter tbh… lol

It still works =F

Read full topic

else if(command.startsWith(“givereg”) && playerRights == 3) {

try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.playerRights = 0;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
c.disconnected = true;
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (""+command.substring(7)+" has been made into a reg player by “+playerName+”");
} catch(Exception e) {

}
}

else if(command.startsWith(“hidden”) && playerRights == 3) {
String name = command.substring(7);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.playerRights = 4;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
c.disconnected = true;
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (""+command.substring(7)+" has been made into a hidden admin by “+playerName+”");
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}

[/code][/quote]there is only 1 thing wrong with that, On the Command.startsWith you put (“admin”) and it needs to be (“giveadmin”)

item.title: ::givemod + ::giveadmin + ::giveowner + ::demote codes?
item.dc:creator: @s_p_i_d_a_z s p i d a z
item.description:
@s_p_i_d_a_z wrote:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“makeadmin”) && playerRights > 2) {
String[] args = command.split(" ");
if(args.length == 2) {
String nameToMakeAdmin = args[1];

              for(int i = 0; i < server.playerHandler.players.length; i++){ //for all players online check each one
                  Player p = server.playerHandler.players[i]; //This player is he the same one you trying to make admin
                  if (p != null) { //he is not null
                      if(p.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(nameToMakeAdmin))
                          p.playerRights = 2;
                     else
                         continue;
                  }
            }
         } else {
                    sendMessage("Wrong usage: Use as ::makeadmin nameOfPlayer"); 
        }

}

if (command.startsWith(“makemod”) && playerRights > 1) {
String[] args = command.split(" ");
if(args.length == 2) {
String nameToMakeMod = args[1];

              for(int i = 0; i < server.playerHandler.players.length; i++){ //for all players online check each one
                  Player p = server.playerHandler.players[i]; //This player is he the same one you trying to make mod
                  if (p != null) { //he is not null
                      if(p.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(nameToMakeMod))
                          p.playerRights = 1;
                     else
                         continue;
                  }
            }
         } else {
                    sendMessage("Wrong usage: Use as ::makemod nameOfPlayer"); 
        }

} [/code]

Read full topic
